item.title: Aggressive Training
item.fluff: Your tactics are legendary for their devastating nature

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Intimidate checks.
Level 14: +3 item bonus.
Level 24: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Effect: You make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy.

item.title: Beloved Performer
item.fluff: You are known for your daring escapades and your mocking wit

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and Bluff checks.
Level 11: +3 item bonus.
Level 21: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy marks you
Effect: The triggering mark ends, and you shift 1 square.
Level 11: This power can be used as an opportunity reaction instead.
Level 21: This power is an encounter power instead.

item.title: Focused Static
item.fluff: You learn to project your thoughts to scramble your enemies' minds

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You score a critical hit against an enemy with a psionic power
Effect: The triggering enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 12: A -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends) or until the end of your next turn, whichever is longer.
Level 22: The triggering enemy's thoughts a scrambled (save ends). While its thoughts are scrambled, the enemy is dazed and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

item.title: Iron Hand Anvil Breaker
item.fluff: Move slowly to center your body, find the weakness in your target that will cause it to crumble, and then strike

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You move up to half your speed.
The first melee attack you make this turn deals 1d6 extra damage, or 2d6 extra damage against an unattended, inanimate object.
Level 12: 3d6 against an inanimate object.
Level 22: 2d6 extra damage, or 4d6 extra damage against an inanimate object.
